analysis.key_quote: Putting them under the category of working at the pleasure of the President and the White House would cause untold damage to the work and the functions of the various agencies and departments and would give any White House far too much unaccountable power.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the erosion of civil service protections, and the potential for authoritarianism, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
